CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Outside space;-
Regarding the property, kindly provide details about any permissions granted for utilizing outdoor spaces such as the garden, terrace, patio, balcony, roof terrace, communal gardens, or any other relevant areas. Additionally, please confirm that there are no restrictive agreements that hinder the peaceful enjoyment of these spaces and verify that they are included as part of the property you are leasing or selling.
CustomField.label: Outdoor Space Details And Restrictions
